Articles.Content:
Hello all, I got the game about a week ago and just today completed my first orbit of and return to Kerbit.

Needless to say I screwed around a fair bit before making any real progress

Anywho, y'all can call me Trevor. I hope to interact with you all at some point along the way. Thanks!

Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear you've been having a blast with the game.

If you ever want to learn more about the game, check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig). It has a large collection of tutorials and other useful links that might help you as you work through some of the game's more difficult areas. Don't be afraid to ask questions in the How To section of the forums, either, as the people who are frequent posters there tend to be quite knowledgeable and experienced.

Happy landings!
